message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm the first mover!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much!
I'll give you a bit less, but I'm still in the driver's seat!
I'm starting to get a bit more aggressive, Bob! You can't keep taking advantage of me!
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're getting close to desperation!
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offers, Bob. I'm taking control of this negotiation!
You're getting desperate, Alice. It's time to make a real offer
